title: Jets, Zion Williamson, Bubba Wallace, Tom Brady, 49ers
itunes:title: Jets, Zion Williamson, Bubba Wallace, Tom Brady, 49ers
description:
Colin talks about the ongoing drama between the Jets and Jamal Adams, why Zion Williamson will one day be the face of the NBA, why he's glad the FBI investigated the Bubba Wallace incident, why Tom Brady will most likely play well this season, and the one thing the 49ers do better than most teams. Guests include Nick Swisher, Chris Simms, John Smoltz, and Brandon Marshall.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
